name: cipher snek
description:
Cipher Snek plays much like the Snake you know and love, with the added twist that you must discover your next target through the process of encryption, using the Vigenere cipher.

A helpful tutorial on applying this cipher can be found here:

http://practicalcryptography.com/ciphers/vigenere-gronsfeld-and-autokey-cipher/

The process of encrypting messages becomes harder as the levels progress, so you need to get on top of your cipher game ASAP!
